text: Nɨbi binɨb God nop kelɨgɨl chɨg tep ma gɨpɨm okok, taynen anɨgɨpɨm? Binɨb gos kɨli tap lum awl yɨl yɨbɨl amub okok, kɨli God nop mɨlɨk nɨŋɨd penpen gɨpal. Anɨb ak kɨli gos kɨli tap lum awl yɨl yɨbɨl amnɨmuŋ agɨl gos nepal okok, kɨli God binɨb penpen gep ne okok mɨdebal. Anɨb ak ma nepɨm akaŋ?
